chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)

Premises:
A_1 = fix A_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (y : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A_1 m0 k y | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y0 y then x0 else A_1 m0 k y else A_1 m0 k y end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z
pred_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {pred m k x} + {~ pred m k x}
cA_eq_aux : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
cA_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
cA_1_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA_1 m k z = top m k z
top_bottom_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> top m k (bottom m k z) = top m k z
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z
fixpt_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> ~ pred m k z -> cA m k z = z /\ cA_1 m k z = z

cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_...

exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA m k z)
exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA_1 m k z)
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
exd_B_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (B_1 m k x) z

```coq
intros m k z Hinv Hexd.

- rewrite cA_eq_aux; auto.
